data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chen, Wen-Hong, Radbouchoom, Sirilak, Nguyen, Hieu Quang, Nguyen, Hiep Tien, Nguyen 4, Khang Sinh, Shui, Yu-Min (2018): Seven new species of Begonia (Begoniaceae) in Northern Vietnam and Southern China. PhytoKeys 94: 65-85, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.94.23248, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.94.23248
